AgentDescription: This agent will help with tasks that involves planning of personal education timetables, showing of grades history, or finding extra learning resources or assessment papers online
This agent is useful when there is a prompt regarding healthcare, where the user wants to check what are some possible diagnoses given some of the symptoms the user provide
This agent will track how much carbon footprint the user is producing given their daily activities
This agent is useful when none of the rest of the agents can be used to help with the prompt
